channel.title: CVE Feed for Visualmodo -- Borderless – Widgets, Elements, Templates and Toolkit for Elementor & Gutenberg
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Visualmodo -- Borderless – Widgets, Elements, Templates and Toolkit for Elementor & Gutenberg

item.title: CVE-2024-34757|2024-05-17T05:59:00.934Z -- visualmodo -- borderless%20%E2%80%93%20widgets%2C%20elements%2C%20templates%20and%20toolkit%20for%20elementor%20%26%20gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Visualmodo Borderless – Widgets, Elements, Templates and Toolkit for Elementor & Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Borderless – Widgets, Elements, Templates and Toolkit for Elementor & Gutenberg: from n/a through 1.5.3.
